title: Executive Assistant (Male Candidates Only)
job_overview:
Remote | Full-Time | EST Time Zone

About the Role
We are looking for a male Executive Assistant to support a business owner involved in various industries including property restoration, medical supply, construction management, and holding companies. This role requires someone highly proactive, detail-oriented, and trustworthy, with strong administrative and organizational skills.

This is not your typical admin role—our ideal candidate will act as a right hand to the owner, helping manage tasks across multiple entities, keep operations on track, and drive special projects forward. It's a dynamic, high-trust position with long-term potential and room to grow.

Key Responsibilities

Provide daily administrative support across multiple businesses

Coordinate intercompany transactions, invoices, and correspondence

Assist with special projects such as medical supply sourcing and legal/financial documentation

Organize digital files, operational SOPs, and project reports

Draft/edit internal forms, documents, and business communications

Manage project calendars, meeting schedules, and deadline tracking

Assist with financial organization, including receipts, QuickBooks data, and reporting

Support and improve workflows and systems across teams

Conduct light research and communicate with vendors, partners, and clients

Work collaboratively with other virtual teaUpgrade to see actual infombers

Qualifications

Minimum of 2 years experience in Executive Assistance, Project Coordination, or Operations Support

Strong organizational and multitasking skills

Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook, Excel, and QuickBooks Desktop

Excellent English communication skills (written and verbal)

Experience in multiple business functions is a plus

High integrity and discretion when handling sensitive information

Self-motivated and resourceful—able to work independently and problem-solve on the go

How to apply: Please send us your CV, Intro video and Active Whatsapp number
